author: Fextralife
description:
I Played Phantom Blade Zero AGAIN - NEW GAMEPLAY Impressions
In this Fextralife video, we're going to be taking a look at Phantom Blade Zero. Phantom Blade Zero is a game we've covered quite a bit on this channel over the last year or so, and it's a game I got to play again at Gamescom this year, a newer version of the game, and I think it's a game that people in our community are absolutely going to love. It is so much fun to play, and the gameplay that you're going to be seeing today is diffrent from what I've shown previously, because this is a different area of the game and it has different enemies and different bosses.

Timestamp
0:00 Phantom Blade Zero Gamescom 2025 Impressions

1:43 Hellwalker  Hardest Difficulty 
2:18 Weapons
3:07 Seamless Death Weapon
3:41 Weapon switching

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!

title: I Played Phantom Blade Zero AGAIN - NEW GAMEPLAY Impressions
